author: Sakurai Norio
23811.description:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’. 
Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl. Brought to you by the zany mind behind [url=https://mangadex.org/title/5499][i]Mitsudomoe[/url] and [url=https://mangadex.org/title/22996][i]Rororro![/url], [url=https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Sakurai%20Norio]Sakurai Norio[/url].

[u][*]Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.[/u][u][*]Was nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award.[/u][hr][b]Links for bonus content:[/b]
[spoiler]
[*]High res extra comics and art are often uploaded to [url=https://twitter.com/i/moments/1123142178996228096]the author's twitter[/url]
[*]Higher resolution versions of comics and art are uploaded usually at a delay to [url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/35504719]the author's pixiv[/url]
[*]Less often exclusive art is posted to [url=https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273]the series' official account[/url]
[*][url=https://youtu.be/9Y-lWP_Cctg]Live action PV[/url]
[/spoiler]
23811.title: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu
